ufolib.engine
Class UfoManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ufolib.engine.UfoManager
public class UfoManager
extends java.lang.Object

Manage Ufo Fonts. Parts are parts of waba.applet.JavaBridge adopted for UfoFont. Parts are parts of waba.fx.Graphics adopted for UfoFont.
